name: Oppai Puzzle L
description:
It's been a busy day.
Now, relax your body and come this way.
❤❤Let the elder sister come to comfort your body after a long day❤❤GamePlaySwap puzzle pieces to complete levels and unlock more viewing modes.
Let 12 different big sisters complete their serving to you.FeatureViewing mode after completing a level
"Enter" key to quickly complete the current level
"↑ ↓ → ←" arrow keys to quickly switch between levels and viewing modes
